humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the maximum size of the tumor as 2.2 cm, which falls within the range for a T2 tumor (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). The tumor is an invasive ductal carcinoma, and the T stage is determined by the size of the largest tumor, ignoring any substaging information. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the size of the tumor is 'max. 2.2 cm,' which falls within the range for a T2 stage tumor (>2 cm and $\leq$ 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.
